## Reproduce Figure 3.18

```{r}
# p. 47

# Inspect the Data
NHANES

# Data Wrangling
Nhanes2 <-
  NHANES %>%
  select(AgeDecade, BMI_WHO, Diabetes) %>%
  arrange(AgeDecade)

Nhanes2Clean <-
  NHANES2[- c(1:2766), ]

Nhanes2Plot <-
  mosaicplot(~ droplevels(AgeDecade) + BMI_WHO + Diabetes, data = NHANES2, shade = TRUE, xlab = "AgeDecade")

```
